    • Uses of ArrowDictionaryBatch in org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc

      Methods in org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc that return ArrowDictionaryBatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrowDictionaryBatch ArrowFileReader.readDictionary() 
      protected ArrowDictionaryBatch ArrowStreamReader.readDictionary()
      Read a dictionary batch message, will be invoked after the schema and before normal record batches are read.
      protected abstract ArrowDictionaryBatch ArrowReader.readDictionary()
      Read a dictionary batch from the source, will be invoked after the schema has been read and called N times, where N is the number of dictionaries indicated by the schema Fields.
